home.desc1: Seasoned web engineer with over 7 years of experience, transitioning from .NET to specializing in scalable, high-performance front-end architectures since 2018.
home.desc2: Senior in hands-on development of core features, crafting reusable components, and optimizing performance for maintainable, enterprise-grade applications.
home.desc3: Proven team leader with deep domain expertise in DeFi, finance, healthcare, and construction, driving technical excellence in high-impact projects.
home.desc4: Passionate about architecting robust, AI-integrated solutions, mentoring teams, and delivering future-proof codebases for global-scale platforms.

about.detail1: Full-stack development excites me a lot, but I prefer Frontend to Backend a little bit.
about.detail2: I gained hands-on experience in building RESTful APIs and responsive Single-Page-Apps (SPA) with both Server-Side Rendering and Client-Side Rendering.
about.thanks: Thank you so much for stopping by my portfolio pages!
